translation.ja: やあ ミス･ソレント

translation.en: Me likey.
translation.ja: 気に入ったよ

translation.en: Now, uh... why don't you put something on the glass?
translation.ja: 用意してきたモノを 見せてみろ

translation.en: Chef's choice. Omakase!
translation.ja: シェフの“お任せ”だ

translation.en: You need to put something on the glass for me first:
translation.ja: その前に教えてくれ

translation.en: answers.
translation.ja: 答えを

translation.en: Oh, man. Another catfish?
translation.ja: 何だよ　またなりすましか

translation.en: Shoot.
translation.ja: クソ

translation.en: I worshipped you, man.
translation.ja: あんたに憧れてた

translation.en: How could you do something so sick?
translation.ja: なぜヤバいことを？

translation.en: And not good sick, like sneakers you wait in line for.
translation.ja: イケてるって 意味じゃなくて―

translation.en: Bad sick, like when they found E.T. in that stream.
translation.ja: “瀕死(ひんし)のＥ.Ｔ.”みたいな 悪い意味だ

translation.en: What's going on with the camera?
translation.ja: あのカメラは？

translation.en: Oh, I'm making a documentary.
translation.ja: ドキュメンタリー撮影だ

translation.en: - About me? - No, it's about me
translation.ja: 私の？ 俺のだ　ＤＪとの面会シーン

translation.en: needing a DJ for my wedding.
translation.ja: 俺のだ　ＤＪとの面会シーン

translation.en: Stupid. Why would anybody wanna make a... a movie about ole Dicky Slizzard, right?
translation.ja: ＤＪスリザードなんてクソだ 私の才能は―

translation.en: Only thing I've ever been good at is manipulating people.
translation.ja: 人を洗脳することだけ

translation.en: Hey, don't say that. You were also a great DJ.
translation.ja: そんなことない 天才ＤＪだ

translation.en: Yeah, I were.
translation.ja: 昔はな

translation.en: I mean, it's hopeless for me.
translation.ja: 今の私に望みはない

translation.en: For somebody to get my case reopened,
translation.ja: 再審に持ち込むには―

translation.en: they'd have to be really smart, have to have some money,
translation.ja: スーパー頭脳と金が必要だ

translation.en: bunch of cameras. They'd have to have a...
translation.ja: 何台ものカメラと―

translation.en: a visitor's pass to this prison. I mean...
translation.ja: このムショの 面会許可証も要る

translation.en: Good luck, Dick!
translation.ja: せいぜい頑張れ

translation.en: I'm out of here, man.
translation.ja: 私は もう戻る

translation.en: - Sliz, wait. - What?
translation.ja: 待ってくれ

translation.en: Could I really get your case reopened? Like, is that a real thing?
translation.ja: マジで再審にできるのか？

translation.en: Adnan from Serial,
translation.ja: 「シリアル」のＡ･サイード

translation.en: Staircase guy, Dr. Richard Kimble...
translation.ja: 「ブロンソン」の Ｍ･ピーターソン

translation.en: they all had their cases reopened because of a supersmart documentary
translation.ja: 彼らは完璧な ドキュメンタリーのお陰で

translation.en: that didn't leave anything out.
translation.ja: 彼らは完璧な ドキュメンタリーのお陰で 再審にこぎつけた

translation.en: And that's when, all on my own,
translation.ja: この時 自分の力だけで―

translation.en: I came up with a new idea for what my documentary should be about.
translation.ja: このドキュメンタリーの 方向性を思いついた

translation.en: So I started looking into it.
translation.ja: 早速 調査開始だ

translation.en: And this whole thing... didn't make any sense.
translation.ja: この事件は つじつまが合わなかった

translation.en: I mean, have you even seen these Mole Women?
translation.ja: 〝行方不明者〞 “モグラ･ウーマン”だ “モグラ･ウーマン”だ

translation.en: There is a reason that they're named after the least attractive insectivore.
translation.ja: そんなダサい呼び名には 理由がある

translation.en: To quote my personal hero and, oh, I don't know, the President...
translation.ja: 個人的なヒーロー 大統領の言葉を引用する

translation.en: Take a look. Look at her.
translation.ja: 彼女を見てみろ

translation.en: You tell me what you think. I don't think so. I don't think so.
translation.ja: 彼女をどう思う？ 私は遠慮したい

translation.en: Believe me, she would not be my first choice. That, I can tell you.
translation.ja: 彼女を選ばないことだけは 確かだ

translation.en: Look, DJ Slizzard is hot--
translation.ja: ＤＪスリザードは アリクイ並みにイケてる

translation.en: as hot as the hottest insectivore.
translation.ja: ＤＪスリザードは アリクイ並みにイケてる ＤＪスリザードは アリクイ並みにイケてる 〝アリクイ〞

translation.en: Did the Mole Women match up?
translation.ja: 〝魅力認定〞 〝魅力認定〞 “モグラ”が釣り合うのか？ “モグラ”が釣り合うのか？

translation.en: It was horrible.  And I missed, like, ten Olympics.
translation.ja: 悪夢よ　オリンピックも 10回 見逃した

translation.en: It was only nine, Miss Schmidt.
translation.ja: たった９回だ

translation.en: Now are you ready to be honest with us?
translation.ja: 正直に答えてくれ

translation.en: Hi, Donna Maria Nuñez? I'm DJ Fingablast. I'm making a documentary.
translation.ja: ＤＪフィンガーだ ドキュメンタリーを撮ってる

translation.en: - How old are you? - Huh?
translation.ja: 年齢は？

translation.en: Show us the birth cert!
translation.ja: 出生証明書を

translation.en: I didn't know that the monkeys who work in my factories
translation.ja: 〈工場のサルが 未成年だって―〉

translation.en: - were underage. - No, how old are you?
translation.ja: 何歳？ 〈知らなかったの〉

translation.en: BunCo Bunkers' five- year warranty is void in the state of purchase. 0% APR financing intended as a joke.
translation.ja: 当システムの ５年保証は冗談で無効 〝バンコ 地下生存システム〞

translation.en: Product not endorsed by the Peyton Manning who plays football.
translation.ja: アメフト選手の 承認もなし 〝９ドル99セント ご注文を！〞

translation.en: FYI, my fantasy bunker...
translation.ja: 〝ＤＪスリザードに 釣り合う？　いいえ〞 〝ＤＪスリザードに 釣り合う？　いいえ〞 理想の地下壕の住人は Ｃ･シファー 理想の地下壕の住人は Ｃ･シファー

translation.en: Copperfield- era Claudia Schiffer,
translation.ja: 理想の地下壕の住人は Ｃ･シファー

translation.en: two Maria Menounoses,
translation.ja: マリア･メノウノスを２人

translation.en: and one of them pomegranate juice bottles.
translation.ja: １人は超絶スタイル

translation.en: Bam, bam, buh- bam!
translation.ja: ボンッ キュッ ボン！

translation.en: DJ Slizzard, I'm starting to think...
translation.ja: 〝ポム･ワンダフル〞 〝ポム･ワンダフル〞 あんたは もしかして― あんたは もしかして―

translation.en: - you didn't even do it. - Hey, look,
translation.ja: 無実の罪で… 私はただの誘拐犯だ

translation.en: you're the documentary guy. I'm just a kidnapper. Just a... reverend.
translation.ja: 私はただの誘拐犯だ ただの教祖…　ただの…

translation.en: I- I'm just a...
translation.ja: ただの教祖…　ただの…

translation.en: I'm just an American DJ.
translation.ja: アメリカ人ＤＪだ

translation.en: If you didn't do it, who did?
translation.ja: 無実なら真犯人は？

translation.en: You know what? Why don't you ask yourself this:
translation.ja: 自問自答してみろ

translation.en: who stood to benefit...
translation.ja: 誰が得をする？

translation.en: from this guy being locked up?
translation.ja: 私がムショにいたら

translation.en: Like Hillary should've been.
translation.ja: ヒラリーかも

translation.en: Think about it.
translation.ja: 考えてみろ

translation.en: I mean, I did have a rival. DJ Traphouse.
translation.ja: 私にはライバルがいた ＤＪトラップハウスだ

translation.en: Another DJ?
translation.ja: もう一人のＤＪ？

translation.en: As one of our own, I couldn't believe
translation.ja: 〝ＤＪトラップハウス〞 俺らの仲間か 〝ＤＪトラップハウス〞 〝ＤＪトラップハウス〞 まさか身内が 身内を裏切るなんて

translation.en: that one of our own could do this to one of our own.
translation.ja: まさか身内が 身内を裏切るなんて

translation.en: And with you out of the way--
translation.ja: あんたが…

translation.en: Oh, to him fall the spoils of my... Golden... Kingdom:
translation.ja: 消えれば 私の王国は すべて奴のものだ

translation.en: three p.m. slot at Slappy's Pizza; signature banter,
translation.ja: ピザ屋での３時のＤＪ お得意の軽口

translation.en: like, Wake up, fatties, it's time to boogie;
translation.ja: “おデブさん　踊ろう”とか

translation.en: and my antique buffalo- horn and boar- bristle hairbrush collection.
translation.ja: バッファローの角も ブタの剛毛ブラシも

translation.en: I finally had a lead.
translation.ja: 手掛かりを見つけた

translation.en: You need to find DJ Traphouse.
translation.ja: 奴を捜し出せ

translation.en: I had to find DJ Traphouse and get him to confess.
translation.ja: ＤＪトラップハウスを見つけ 自白させれば―

translation.en: Then Slizzard could J my wedding.
translation.ja: ＤＪスリザードが 結婚式でＤＪできる

translation.en: But no matter how much I drove around, I couldn't find him
translation.ja: だが いくら捜し回っても 見つからず―

translation.en: or get him to confess.
translation.ja: 自白も頼めない

translation.en: So I gave up, did ayahuasca in a cemetery,
translation.ja: 捜すのは諦め 墓地で幻覚茶を飲み―

translation.en: and it led me straight to Traphouse's current address.
translation.ja: 奴の所に 導いてもらうことにした

translation.en: Hey, he's here.
translation.ja: ここにいた

translation.en: My hero is in jail, and the only person who could free him is dead.
translation.ja: ヒーローを自由にできる人は 死んでしまった

translation.en: And I still don't have a wedding DJ.
translation.ja: 式のＤＪが決まらない

translation.en: So I went back to the only place where I'd ever truly felt safe:
translation.ja: そこで唯一 心の休まる 場所へ戻った

translation.en: Rockswater.
translation.ja: ロックスウォーター邸だ

translation.en: - More sideways. - Okay.
translation.ja: もっと横向きだ

translation.en: That's it.
translation.ja: そうだ

translation.en: Then everything went - from bad... -
translation.ja: そうして事態は “最悪”から―

translation.en: ...to, Oh, no, you didn't.
translation.ja: “ウソだろ”へ

translation.en: Hey, everyone. I said m'kay.
translation.ja: みんな　オッケーよ

translation.en: #pennies.
translation.ja: ＃１セント

translation.en: Do you accept a collect call from Grundel County Men's Prison?
translation.ja: グランデル郡男子刑務所から コレクトコールです

translation.en: Yes, I do.
translation.ja: つないでくれ

translation.en: What do you mean, you're out?!
translation.ja: 降りるって？

translation.en: You're leaving me hanging, like my cellmate who couldn't take it.
translation.ja: 投げ出すのか？ 前の同房者みたいに

translation.en: Sliz, there's no point. I don't need a DJ for my wedding anymore.
translation.ja: 仕方ないさ もう結婚式のＤＪは要らない

translation.en: You're like the Drunk History guy. You got Tiffany Haddish right here,
translation.ja: 酔っ払い番組の 司会者みたいだな

translation.en: and you're making this about you?!
translation.ja: 最後は自分中心か？

translation.en: She dumped me like a poop, bro.
translation.ja: 彼女に ウンコみたいに捨てられた

translation.en: Bleep- bloop!
translation.ja: “ブー　ブー”

translation.en: She dumped me like a poop, bruh.
translation.ja: ウンコみたいに捨てられた

translation.en: There was nothing left for me in Indiana,
translation.ja: インディアナ州に もう用はない

translation.en: so I took my airport camera and went back to New York.
translation.ja: 空港のカメラを外して ＮＹへ帰った

translation.en: Where's the off switch?
translation.ja: どこで切るんだ？

translation.en: Oh, there it is.
translation.ja: ここか

translation.en: Why?
translation.ja: なんでだ？

translation.en: I don't wanna say good- bye to Hello.
translation.ja: ハローとバイバイなんて イヤだよ

translation.en: - - I was lost. There was no point continuing with the film.  ♪ Life's not always Miami ♪
translation.ja: 撮影を続ける意義を 見失っていた

translation.en: Ah, turn off the camera!
translation.ja: カメラを止めろ

translation.en: - The documentary's off! - ♪ Life's not always Miami ♪
translation.ja: ドキュメンタリーは中止だ

translation.en: - - ...everything changed.
translation.ja: ところが事態は急変した

translation.en: Hey, yo!
translation.ja: みんな！

translation.en: Take off your wrap gifts, guys.
translation.ja: 撮影記念フリースを脱げ

translation.en: The documentary is not over.
translation.ja: ドキュメンタリー続行だ

translation.en: I might need a wedding DJ after all.
translation.ja: 式のＤＪが必要になるかも

translation.en: Someone posted on Karen Sorrento's Facebook page.
translation.ja: カレンのＦＢに 書き込みがあった カレンのＦＢに 書き込みがあった 〝今度 会わない？ フラン･ドッドより〞

translation.en: But that's a straight man,
translation.ja: 〝今度 会わない？ フラン･ドッドより〞 〝今度 会わない？ フラン･ドッドより〞 その男はストレートだ

translation.en: and Karen is you pretending to be--
translation.ja: カレンは君の女装…

translation.en: I just need a win, Scott.
translation.ja: “勝ち”が欲しいんだ

translation.en: And I said take your fleece off!
translation.ja: さあ フリースを脱げ

translation.en: Let's go, boys!
translation.ja: いくぞ　みんな！

translation.en: Come on! Whoo!
translation.ja: やるぞ！

translation.en: That's amazing.
translation.ja: すごいな

translation.en: - I love sour cream. - Oh, who doesn't?
translation.ja: サワークリーム好き 俺もだ

translation.en: Instead of a tip, I just wrote, Here's a tip, try the cheese.
translation.ja: チップの代わりに 助言(チップ)を残した

translation.en: - She's probably mad. - Oh!
translation.ja: 怒ってるかな

translation.en: - This is mad fun. - Yeah.
translation.ja: 楽しいわ

translation.en: But I gotta come clean...
translation.ja: でも告白がある

translation.en: I'm not a beautiful woman.
translation.ja: 美しい女じゃない

translation.en: I'm a beautiful man...
translation.ja: 美しい男だ

translation.en: a man who now feels pretty good about himself thanks to you, Fran.
translation.ja: あんたのお陰で自信が戻った

translation.en: Another catfish.
translation.ja: また なりすましか

translation.en: Damn it. I knew you were too cool to be a female.
translation.ja: 女にしてはイケすぎてた

translation.en: Cool like how?
translation.ja: どんな風に？

translation.en: Look at your profile, dude. You're a dream girl.
translation.ja: プロフィールも理想の女だ

translation.en: MAGA, ka- ra- tay, DJ Slizzard...
translation.ja: トランプ　カラテ ＤＪスリザード

translation.en: ...girls in bikinis getting really hurt.
translation.ja: ビキニの女性は…

translation.en: Wait, you're a Slizzard Lizard?
translation.ja: スリザード･ファン？

translation.en: Are you kidding me? He played my great- aunt's nasty 90th.
translation.ja: 大叔母の90歳祝いの ＤＪだった

translation.en: - - And he went home with her... as a joke.
translation.ja: 冗談で大叔母を “お持ち帰り”に

translation.en: - - God, it just kills me that he's still locked up.
translation.ja: 服役中なんてショックだよ

translation.en: Especially since I know he shouldn't even be in jail.
translation.ja: そもそも無実なのに

translation.en: I don't believe in fate,
translation.ja: 運命は信じない 運命は信じない 再現ドラマ

translation.en: so it was probably magic elves who brought Fran and me together that night.
translation.ja: 再現ドラマ 再現ドラマ 彼との出会いは 妖精のお陰だろう 再現ドラマ

translation.en: Hi. Um... I am Fran Dodd.
translation.ja: どうも 俺はフラン･ドッド

translation.en: I am founder and C- F- Bro of The Innocence Broject,
translation.ja: 〝えん罪被害者を救おう ブロジェクト〞創設者だ フラン･ドッド 〝えん罪被害者を救おう ブロジェクト〞創設者だ 〝えん罪被害者を救おう ブロジェクト〞創設者だ えん罪被害者を救おう ブロジェクト創設者

translation.en: an organization that fights back in the war on men.
translation.ja: 〝えん罪被害者を救おう ブロジェクト〞創設者だ えん罪被害者を救おう ブロジェクト創設者

translation.en: I am telling you, man,
translation.ja: えん罪被害者を救おう ブロジェクト創設者 男たち(ブロ)は攻撃を受けてる

translation.en: men are under attack.
translation.ja: 男たち(ブロ)は攻撃を受けてる

translation.en: Do you know how many times I have been stabbed with keys?
translation.ja: 俺が何回 鍵で刺されたと？ 俺が何回 鍵で刺されたと？ 〝サイン　サイン サイン〞

translation.en: Nineteen times, just for
translation.ja: 〝サイン　サイン サイン〞 〝サイン　サイン サイン〞 19回だ 〝サイン　サイン サイン〞 〝サイン　サイン サイン〞 女性の顔の近くを 歩いただけで

translation.en: walking closely to a woman's face.
translation.ja: 女性の顔の近くを 歩いただけで

translation.en: This is where, uh, we keep a lot of, like, our-- our case files here,
translation.ja: ここに事件のファイルを 置いてある

translation.en: like, uh, Cosby.
translation.ja: ここに事件のファイルを 置いてある Ｂ･コスビーのレイプ疑惑

translation.en: That's a big one.
translation.ja: Ｂ･コスビーのレイプ疑惑

translation.en: Uh, Mr. Frumpus.
translation.ja: パペットのセクハラ

translation.en: Richard-- Richard's file? Yeah, it's in here.
translation.ja: リチャードのファイルは こっちだ

translation.en: This is all proof.
translation.ja: 〝リチャード･ウェイン〞 〝リチャード･ウェイン〞 全部 証拠だ 全部 証拠だ

translation.en: How about this right here?
translation.ja: 〝ハーヴェイ･ ワインスタイン〞 〝ハーヴェイ･ ワインスタイン〞 ディック･ウェインは 今どこに？

translation.en: Where is Dick Wayne being held right now? Okay, well, let's just take a look right here...
translation.ja: ディック･ウェインは 今どこに？

translation.en: 'cause this is where Dick Wayne is being held.
translation.ja: ここに収容されてる

translation.en: Can you get close enough?
translation.ja: アップにして

translation.en: Says it right here. Right here.
translation.ja: ここに書いてある

translation.en: Men-- Men's Prison.
translation.ja: “男子刑務所”

translation.en: Not People's Prison.
translation.ja: 人々の刑務所じゃない

translation.en: Mee- en's Prison. Okay?
translation.ja: 男子の刑務所だ 最初から 男だけ入れるつもりだ

translation.en: They knew when they built this place who they were gonna lock up.
translation.ja: 最初から 男だけ入れるつもりだ

translation.en: It's absolutely disgusting. Masculinity is being criminalized in this country, okay?
translation.ja: 男らしさは この国では 犯罪扱いされてる

translation.en: And I want something done did about it.
translation.ja: 改善すべきだ

translation.en: Because what you're accused of
translation.ja: あんたのしたことは 犯罪じゃない

translation.en: - shouldn't be a crime. - Exactly.
translation.ja: あんたのしたことは 犯罪じゃない そのとおりだ

translation.en: I mean, are we even talking about? Innocent and-- and guilty?
translation.ja: 無罪か有罪か 論じてる時点でおかしい

translation.en: Sorry, what I did was called nature.
translation.ja: 私のしたことは本能だ

translation.en: I mean, look at dolphins. They're huge rapists, and ladies kiss them right on their holes over at SeaWorld.
translation.ja: 女どもは強姦魔(ごうかんま)のイルカに キスしたがるのに―

translation.en: Why isn't anybody getting a tattoo of me on their ankle?
translation.ja: 私のタトゥーは入れない

translation.en: Men are not the problem. Women are the problem.
translation.ja: 問題は男じゃない 女たちだ

translation.en: Things were fine until we started letting them make their own decisions.
translation.ja: 女に決定権を与えたのが 間違いだ

translation.en: L- listen, y'all. Let me tell you
translation.ja: 君たちに１つ話をしよう

translation.en: about a-- about a good friend of mine
translation.ja: 君たちに１つ話をしよう すごくハンサムな 私の良き友人の話だ

translation.en: who's really handsome.
translation.ja: すごくハンサムな 私の良き友人の話だ

translation.en: And he went...
translation.ja: 彼は昔 ＬＡに行った

translation.en: to LA, saved up all his money,
translation.ja: 彼は昔 ＬＡに行った 貯金をして 髪形もキメて―

translation.en: got a sweet- ass butt cut,
translation.ja: 貯金をして 髪形もキメて―

translation.en: and did the ladies a favor... by going on a TV dating show.
translation.ja: 女たちを喜ばせようと デート番組に出た

translation.en: Richard, how are you gonna make her feel special?
translation.ja: リチャード デート･プランは？

translation.en: Well... we'd start off with some fabulous food,
translation.ja: そうだな　ファビュラスな 食事と―

translation.en: - a little fabulous conversation... -
translation.ja: ファビュラスな会話

translation.en: ...end it with a fabulous foot massage,
translation.ja: ファビュラスな フットマッサージで

translation.en: for an evening of total fabulosity.
translation.ja: ファビュラスな夜を

translation.en: And she chose Marc!
translation.ja: マークが選ばれた

translation.en: I mean, what? They got to go to the zoo together.
translation.ja: 一緒に動物園でも行きやがれ

translation.en: Why does she even get to choose at all?
translation.ja: なぜ女が選ぶ？

translation.en: Men should be doing the choosing!
translation.ja: 男が選ぶべきだ

translation.en: Man. I thought women should do what they want, but if they couldn't,
translation.ja: 女性の自由を 尊重してこなければ―

translation.en: I'd still be with Hello.
translation.ja: ハローと結婚できた

translation.en: God, why'd she dump me?
translation.ja: なぜ捨てられた

translation.en: Because women are stupid. They don't even know how to make decisions good.
translation.ja: 女はアホだからだ マトモな決断もできん

translation.en: You should see my mommy try and order at a restaurant.
translation.ja: うちのお袋を見ろ

translation.en: So that night, I did.
translation.ja: その夜 本当に見に行った

translation.en: Southern rib platter. Yum!
translation.ja: リブ肉の大皿？　おいしそう

translation.en: - No, I'll never eat all that. - No.
translation.ja: でも食べきれない

translation.en: But if you were gonna pick between the French dip...
translation.ja: サンドイッチと―

translation.en: - French dip. - ...and the firehouse fajitas--
translation.ja: アツアツのファヒータなら…

translation.en: - French dip. - Oh, my God, what do they have?
translation.ja: アツアツのファヒータなら… ちょっと あれは何？

translation.en: - - God, it is dessert, Sheila! They are having dessert.
translation.ja: あれはデザートだ 食後のデザート！

translation.en: It's dark days, brosephs.
translation.ja: つらい時代だよ

translation.en: They say, You snooze, you lose.
translation.ja: “油断したら チャンスを逃す”

translation.en: Well, we snossed...
translation.ja: 私たちは―

translation.en: and look what we lost.
translation.ja: 何を逃した？

translation.en: After talking to Fran and DJ Sliz,
translation.ja: ２人と話した後 ニュースを読んで―

translation.en: I read the news.
translation.ja: ２人と話した後 ニュースを読んで― 〝ハーヴェイ･ ワインスタイン以降―〞

translation.en: And it was news to me.
translation.ja: 〝ハーヴェイ･ ワインスタイン以降―〞 〝ハーヴェイ･ ワインスタイン以降―〞 我が目を疑った 我が目を疑った 我が目を疑った 〝71人がセクハラ疑惑で 信用失墜〞

translation.en: There really is a war going on.
translation.ja: 〝71人がセクハラ疑惑で 信用失墜〞 戦争が勃発している

translation.en: I mean, who's next, the majestic anteater?
translation.ja: 次の犠牲者は誰だ？ アリクイか？

translation.en: I also learned
translation.ja: それからアメリカの はしっこもヤバいらしい

translation.en: our infrastructure is a mess, yo!
translation.ja: それからアメリカの はしっこもヤバいらしい 〝アメリカの橋 ５万基以上に欠陥〞

translation.en: Here we are. Now it's Person of the Year.
translation.ja: 〝アメリカの橋 ５万基以上に欠陥〞 〝アメリカの橋 ５万基以上に欠陥〞 “今年の人”に選ばれたのも女 “今年の人”に選ばれたのも女

translation.en: They hijacked the Ocean's franchise.
translation.ja: 「オーシャンズ８」も

translation.en: Now there's a female Colonel Sanders? What's next, female chickens?
translation.ja: カーネルおじさんまで女 次はチキンか？

translation.en: I don't even get it, y'all. But if we don't take a stand now...
translation.ja: 理解できん 今 立ち上がらなければ―

translation.en: - we're herstory. - Ugh.
translation.ja: 私たちの負けだ

translation.en: They're gonna shestroy everything.
translation.ja: 女たちに食われる

translation.en: I ain't down
translation.ja: そんな世界は―

translation.en: with that world.
translation.ja: お断りだ

translation.en: I have an appointment for a penis removal,
translation.ja: 陰茎切除の予約を入れた

translation.en: - here in the year... -
translation.ja: そう　まさに…

translation.en: - ...this year!
translation.ja: この年に！

translation.en: We have to fight back, or pretty soon, every clip package will look like this.
translation.ja: 今 闘わないと 表舞台は女だらけになる

translation.en: A great man rots in jail right now because Lady Justice is living up to her name.
translation.ja: 正義の女神のせいで 偉大な男が塀の中で腐ってる

translation.en: That coldhearted skank is just ice.
translation.ja: 女神のハートは まさに氷だな

translation.en: Meanwhile, what are DJ Slizzard's supposed victims doing?
translation.ja: その頃 ＤＪスリザードの “犠牲者たち”は？ その頃 ＤＪスリザードの “犠牲者たち”は？ 〝証拠Ｂ モグラ･ウーマン〞

translation.en: Cyndee Pokorny continues to profit from her tragedy.
translation.ja: シンディは悲劇をネタに ボロ稼ぎ

translation.en: She recently sang the national anthem at an NFL preseason game
translation.ja: ＮＦＬのオープン戦で 国歌まで熱唱した

translation.en: between the Atlanta Vaccinators
translation.ja: ＮＦＬのオープン戦で 国歌まで熱唱した アトランタと シカゴの対戦だった

translation.en: and the Chicago Interracial Marriages.
translation.ja: アトランタと シカゴの対戦だった

translation.en: And as for Donna Maria?
translation.ja: ドナ･マリアは―

translation.en: She used wordplay to become a mole sauce
translation.ja: 〝モグラ〞にあやかり オク万長者になり― 〝モグラ〞にあやかり オク万長者になり― 〝モグラ･ウーマンの モレソース〞

translation.en: mole- ionnaire and...

translation.en: a judge on Shark Tank Español.
translation.ja: 「マネーのサメ」の スペイン語版にも出演

translation.en: Marco Americano here is crazy. What you've just described is a horse.

translation.en: I'm out.
translation.ja: 〈私は降りる〉

translation.en: And Gretchen Chalker is the real cult leader.
translation.ja: グレッチェンは 真のカルト･リーダーだ

translation.en: She's now running her own church inside a women's prison!
translation.ja: 女子刑務所内で 教会を主宰してる

translation.en: What? Now they're keeping us out of the prisons we built?
translation.ja: 男が建てたのに 女専用？

translation.en: And in the future, female doctors will remove the penises
translation.ja: 将来は女性医師が 陰茎を切除するでしょう

translation.en: with saws.
translation.ja: ノコギリで

translation.en: Then there's Kimmy Schmidt.
translation.ja: 最後にキミー･シュミット

translation.en: The woman who put Tabby Bobatti in intensive care...
translation.ja: タビーを 集中治療室(ケア)送りにした

translation.en: ended up intensively caring about the Reverend.
translation.ja: 結局は教祖のことを 気にかけて(ケア)いたんだ

translation.en: - That's good writing. -
translation.ja: 〝ケア〞つながりか

translation.en: No wonder she was so mad at Tabby.
translation.ja: 腹を立てたのも当然だ 〝結婚許可書〞

translation.en: Kimmy is married to DJ Slizzard.
translation.ja: 〝結婚許可書〞 ＤＪスリザードとは 夫婦で―

translation.en: I'll never divorce you, Dick! Not even when pigs fly!
translation.ja: 〝グランデル郡男子刑務所 通話録音内容〞 〝グランデル郡男子刑務所 通話録音内容〞 ブタが空を飛んでも 離婚はしない

translation.en: But that would be cute! Birds would be like, Whaaaaat?!
translation.ja: かわいいわよね 鳥たちもビックリ

translation.en: I'm never divorcing you!
translation.ja: 絶対 離婚はしない

translation.en: Maybe this documentary isn't about finding a DJ for my wedding.
translation.ja: 結婚式のＤＪを探す ドキュメンタリーじゃなくて

translation.en: It's just about the best DJ of all:
translation.ja: 最高のＤＪを探す旅かも

translation.en: love.
translation.ja: “愛”だ

translation.en: Have yo- o- o- ou... spoken to Kimmy?
translation.ja: キミーとは話をしたか？

translation.en: Oh, for the documentary? Shoot, that's a good idea.
translation.ja: ドキュメンタリーで？ 名案だ

translation.en: No, don't ever speak to her. I mean, because...
translation.ja: 彼女とは話すな　なぜなら…

translation.en: we value...
translation.ja: プライバシーを―

translation.en: we value our privacy.
translation.ja: 尊重したい

translation.en: That's why I didn't say anything about it.
translation.ja: だから黙ってた

translation.en: You know? Even though our marriage would obviously humanize me,
translation.ja: 結婚を知れば 私の人間味が増すだろうがね

translation.en: audience- wise.
translation.ja: 視聴者的に

translation.en: Wow. Kimmy stood by you, man.
translation.ja: キミーは内助の功だ

translation.en: #NotAllWomen.
translation.ja: ＃そんな女は少ない

translation.en: So I guess...
translation.ja: キミーのように―

translation.en: ...if a good woman like Kimmy
translation.ja: いい女が味方なら…

translation.en: is on my side-- and she is, but again, don't ask her--
translation.ja: 彼女は味方だが 確認はするな

translation.en: then maybe the whole word can get on board
translation.ja: 世界が 仲間になってくれるかも

translation.en: with my fabulosity.
translation.ja: ファビュラスな私のね

translation.en: You gotta finish this movie, Finga.
translation.ja: 映画を完成させろ

translation.en: Finish it up. Hey, win a Peabody, like Entourage.
translation.ja: ピーボディ賞を受賞しろ

translation.en: Then who knows, man? Who knows? Maybe my case gets reopened,
translation.ja: 分からないぞ 本当に再審になって―

translation.en: and maybe I finally get reunited
translation.ja: また一緒になれるかも

translation.en: with my little pasty- faced, ketchup- headed...
translation.ja: 青白い顔で ケチャップ頭の―

translation.en: ...sweetie pateetie.
translation.ja: かわい子ちゃんと

translation.en: Kimmy. That's who I'm talking about. You know.
translation.ja: もちろんキミーのことだ

translation.en: I did my part. You just watched it.
translation.ja: 俺の役目は終わった みんな観てただろ？

translation.en: Still are.
translation.ja: まだ観てる

translation.en: So does Slizzard's story end here?
translation.ja: 彼の物語が ここで終わるかは―

translation.en: That's up to the people who believe in him.
translation.ja: 彼を信じてる人々に かかってる

translation.en: People like Fran Dodd;
translation.ja: フラン･ドッドや―

translation.en: Fran's mom, who supports him no matter what;
translation.ja: フランを常に支える 母親や―

translation.en: Fran's buddy Frisco, who you didn't meet but is cool;
translation.ja: 関係ないが 彼の友達のフリスコ

translation.en: this guy we met who would literally do anything;
translation.ja: 何でもやる この男や―

translation.en: and, of course, - Kimmy Schmidt... - Well--
translation.ja: もちろんキミーも

translation.en: ...TabbyBobatti; this lady;
translation.ja: タビーや この女や この男

translation.en: - that dude... - What is this for?
translation.ja: 何これ？

translation.en: Karen Sorrento; David Caruso;
translation.ja: カレン･ソレント Ｄ･カルーソー

translation.en: Damar Varnish; DJ Traphouse;

translation.en: DJ Trump;
translation.ja: Ｄ･Ｊ･トランプ

translation.en: and the most important person...
translation.ja: 一番 大事なのが―

translation.en: you, America.
translation.ja: あなただ　アメリカ

translation.en: Dude, they won't be able to see themselves.
translation.ja: その鏡じゃ映らないよ

translation.en: We talked about this.

translation.en: Put this part in slow motion!
